description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en:
Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.
Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,
designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage power
distribution systems.

description.zh: 單元操作專論是化工單元操作更深入之專題討論之課程,其(一)內容著重於流體之特性及其應用,高壓或真空之形成,粉粒及超微粒之作業,機械分離(包括滲膜分離),熱輸送及其應用,高溫爐與耐火材料等。
description.en: Special topics on unit operation are an advance course designed for chemical engineering unit operations. It (1) consist of characteristics of fluid and its application, high pressure and vacuum formation, power and super fine powder processing, mechanical separation process(include membrane separation), heat transfer and its application, furnaces and refraction.

name.en: Optical,Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials

description.zh:
一、 簡介
二、 電性質
三、 介電性質
四、 磁性質
五、 光學性質
description.en:
This course is a special topics of Optical，Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Materials.
1.Outline
2.Electrical  Properties
3.Dielectric  Properties
4.Magnetic  Properties
5.Optical  Properties

description.zh:
其內容包括水資源形成、賦存、分佈與時間變化之規律；水資源勘察、
                                         調查、試驗、監測、參數之估算、評估水質與水量變化和條件；水資源
                                         合理之規劃、開發利用、供水及節流計劃估算；水資源補給、人工降雨
                                         與地下水補給、水源涵養、地表水庫調蓄、地下水庫調蓄之水資源養
                                         蓄；水資源保護與保育、污染防治、水土保持；水資源管理與規劃，利
                                         用社會經濟、行政法規、技術等措施。
description.en: ntroduction to Water Resources .

description.zh: 本課程將介紹在固液分離技術應用中,固體於液體間之行為,其中相關之基本理論包括:流體力學、界面現象、膠體行為、以及界面力的問題。至於相關設備介紹方面,將著重於資源回收單元設備之說明,例如:過濾、離心、浮除、沉降、混凝等。
description.en: In the basic theory introduction, theories related to solid and liquid interactions will be introduced, fluid mechanics, liquid and solid interfacial phenomena, colloidal behavior and interfacial forces. In terms of separation instruments, the operation principles of filters, centrifuge, flotation, settling, coagulation, etc. will be described.

description.zh:
金屬材料概念已有充分了解後，利用此基礎知識探討，近年來頗受
工業界注目的新材料，課程內容有：1.超高強度鋼之種類及特性、
用途。2.析出硬化型不銹鋼之種類、特性、用途，熱處理方法。3.超耐熱材料，合金之種類、特性、用途。4.形狀記憶合金之種類、特性、用途。5.超塑性合金之種類、特性、用途。6.特殊模具鋼之種類特性、用途及其熱處理。7.鈦及鈦合金之種類、特性、用途及其處理。
description.en:
After receiving full understanding to the metal materials, using such basic knowledge
to explore new materials which catch wide attention in recent years, its content
covers the following items:1.The specification, usage and property of super high
strength steel. 2. The specification, usage and property of precipitation hardening
stainless steel, and its heat treatment method. 3. The specification, usage and property
of super heat resistant material and alloy. 4.The specification, usage and property of
shape-memory alloy. 5.The specification, usage and property of super plasticity alloy,
6.The specification, usage and property of special mould steel and its heat treatment.
7.The specification, usage and property of titanium and titanium alloy, and their
treatment.

description.zh: 超硬材料是一種越來越普及的新興材料。超硬材料可以作成精密加工工具及多種高價值產品。是提升一國競爭力不可或缺的尖端材料。超硬材料包括鑽石及立方氮化硼。本課程將介紹世界各國最先進製造超硬材料方法，包括超高壓技術及鑽石膜技術。而目前日新月異之超硬材料之發展及應用，亦作進一步介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce the Hard materials.

description.zh: 土木營造工程範圍廣泛，各種法營造工法更是不計其數，本課程教授學生幾種常見之施工法：一、土方工程：1.土壤調查2.挖方3.填方4.搬運5.軟弱地盤之處理6.土方作業計劃7.作業能力估算。二、混凝土工程：1.混凝土材料及其性質2.配比設計3.混凝土之攪料、灌置與搗實4.混凝土之養護與品質控制。三、基礎工程：1.基礎之種類2.淺基礎3.樁基礎4.沈箱5.深開挖及擋土工程6.圍堰7.灌漿。四、專項工程：1.河川工程2.海岸工程3.堰埧工程4.發電工程5.隊道工程6.橋梁工程7.港灣工程8.道路工程9.衛生下水道工程10. 鐵路工程11. 地下構造物工程12. 建築工程13. 機場工程。
description.en:
public work,improving the land and the enviorment,and preventing the harricoms.
Construction Methods includes elementary and applied methods.The purposes of this course are for students understanding the steps of various construction methods.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生：(1)橋梁之功能及組織、(2)橋梁之種類、(3)橋梁之上部結構、(4)橋梁之下部結構：(a)基礎(b)橋台(c)橋墩、(5)橋梁之伸縮設施、(6)橋面排水設施、(7)欄杆及照明設施、(8)跨海大橋、陸橋、高架橋及跨河大橋等簡介。
description.en: Planning,desing,constroution and maintenance of the various bridges.

description.zh: 模型理論,管流理論,渠流理論,渠變理論,數值理論.
description.en: Introduction,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel  flow,Gradually varied flow(Backwatercomputation...),Computation fluid mechanics(ex:FDM,FEM,...)

description.zh: 論述電磁干擾之物理模式與耦合機制。探討各種抗干擾之電磁相容設計實務，其中包括：接地、濾波、瞬態抑制與保護電路、屏蔽、信號互連、積體電路應用防止雜訊措施、印刷電路板抗干擾佈局設計、靜電放電保護等。介紹電磁干擾標準與量測方法。
description.en: Discuss the physical model of electromagnetic interference (EMI) and coupling mechanism. Deal with a variety of design methods for electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) which includes : Grounding, Filtering, Transient suppression and protection, Shielding, Signal interconnection, Prevents noise in IC applications, PCB layout design rules against interference, Electrostatic discharge (ESD) protection, etc. Introduce the EMI standards and measurement techniques.

name.en: Practical Chinese Writting on Various Subject Matters (I)

description.zh: 講授公文及書信。公文之內容包括函、簽、公告、報告等各類常用公文的作法與寫作要領，並兼及處理公文之注意事項。書信之內容包括傳統及現代書信的寫法與寫作要領，並兼及便條與做為便條使用之名片的寫法。
description.en: The course is to teach students how to write and handle official correspondences and social letters.  The contents of social letters include how to write traditional and modern letters, including notes and name cards.

description.zh: 『誰掌握了資訊，誰就獲得先機』。二十世紀人類進入資訊時代，資料型態愈趨多元，各類資訊排山倒海而來，人們不再擔心資訊不足，反倒擔憂『資訊氾濫』，多的不得了。在如此多的資訊中，如何去作最有效的選擇與利用，將是知識份子必備的技能。課程內容包括：科學簡介(定義、特興、方法、發展)、科技指標與各類型資料之介紹與利用。
description.en: "Whoever holds the information takes advantage." With an approach to the information age of the 21st century, people are faced with various types of information, which rushes to us like a flood. People are not worried about being lack of information; instead, they are more worried about a "deluge of information." Encountered with so much information, each of the individual intellectuals finds it essential to know how to pick and make use of -with efficiency--the information in need. This type of ability has become a fundamental skill for modern people. The topics covered in this course include: Introduction to Science (Definition, Properties, Approaches and Development), Technological Indexes, and a diverse types of information.

description.zh: 為了讓學生有機會學習有系統的瞭解、接納自己，體諒父母、尊長，關愛別人，回饋社會，進而發揮潛能，自主自在的過一生，乃設計此種10～15人的獨特小團體，運用團體動力，以「交流分析」(Transactional Analysis,TA)為主要理論架構，採理論與實務、個別與團體並重方式，在師生積極參與中，討論、分享、成長。課程內容主要包含交流分析概述，人格結構與功能分析，自我圖，關愛經濟，愛的證言，交流方式分析，時間結構分析，心理遊戲分析，心理劇本分析的理論與習作等。
description.en: In a systematic way, this course will help students understand themselves, accept themselves, and understand their parents and elders.  Also, it teaches students how to care for other people and have contributions to society with a view to promoting students' potential and live their life self-confiently and freely.  The class is to be desinged into groups composed of 10 to 15 students in each section in order to make use of group interactions, to encourage students to actively participate in class discussion and experience sharing.  On the basis of Transactional Analysis(TA), both theory and practice, individual and group activities are emphasized.  Through such a focus, students will go through various stages leading to personal growth.  The contents of this course include: an introduction to TA, an analysis on personality, self-realization, caring and love experiences, transactional analysis, psychological tests, and game analysis, theory and exercise on psychological plays.

description.zh: 語言是人類情感相互溝通的橋樑，促進人際關係的和諧，而如何把自己的想法、看法、非常輕鬆而正確的說出來，卻不是一件簡單的事。要想說的中肯、說得技巧，就必須經過一番學習與研究。這就牽涉到：與意學、語言學以及倫理學、理則學與表演術，讓別人聽了樂於接納。因此必須注意說話的內容、音調和儀態三方面的基本訓練，更更要注意時間、空間、對象，而有所不同。還要傾聽別人說話的美德。總之，會說不是胡說、亂說、愛說與白說，也就是能放能收、恰到好處。
description.en: Being the bridge of human communication,language improves personal relationship. But how to express oneself comfortably is not that simple. It needs practice and skill if one wants to speak to the point. This 「practice」involves semantics、linguistics、ethics、logic and performance. Therefore, the content、tone and deportment are all essential  elements to a successful speech. When to speak、where to speak and to whom to speak are various components of one's talk. To listen is more important than to speak.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh:
探究永恆的奧秘，追尋自然的真相，是寶石學中最令人癡狂的學習動力。當您望著各類寶石，欣賞它們顏色與光彩的同時，是否也能從另一個角度，去看看大自然千萬年的蘊化奇蹟，與結合多少後天資源使璞石發亮的過程？
寶石領域一如大千世界，不但充滿了驚嘆，也佈滿了色彩。在課程內容上，將藉由豐富的教材，帶您上山下海，探訪寶石的故鄉，從伊麗莎白泰勒的鑽石，賈桂琳甘迺迪的珍珠項鍊、紅藍寶、祖母綠....或關之琳所買下的翡翠、日本皇太子妃的珍珠項鍊、慈禧太后的西瓜碧璽...等等，課程由淺入深循序漸進，不但能帶給您更豐富的珠寶常識，同時也能實際地藉實物練習，到兼具理論與實務的學習樂趣。
description.en:
To probe the mystery of eternity, to searach for the answer of nature, is the charismatic power of learning inside gemology circles.  When you look at the variety of gemstones, do you appreciate their color and luster?  Furthermore, do you also see beyond the beauty and discover the miracle of a gem's thousand-year life?  To see how the multi-complicated processes combine to take a raw stone from the earth and turn it intoa beautiful finished gemstone?
A gem itself is like the no-bounds world, not only full of fascination but also full of colors.  We are going to, by means of plentiful materials, bring each of you into the spectacular mining districts.  From Elizabeth Taylor's "TAYLOR-BURTON" diamond, Catherine Kennedy's jewelry box-pearls, rubies, emeralds...l to Empress Dowager Tzu-Hsi's Watermelon Tourmaline... etc, we will lead you step by step into this fasciating world of gems, and you will also be given practical lessons to probe theories in order to achieve great success in st

description.zh: 本課程旨在欣賞篆竟藝術，認識我國歷代著名的篆竟家與優美的作品，由作品之中廣泛瞭解篆竟多樣化的美感表現與技法，並嘗試實現於創作。篆竟是我國特有的一種藝術形式，除了日常日信的實用功能之外，更普遍使用在書法或繪畫等藝術作品中。因此瞭解篆竟藝術之美，往往是面對其他藝術作品時所不可或缺的。篆竟創作必須在方寸微小的天地之內，專注構思，謹慎刻畫。如此苦心經營的體驗，同時也是十分可貴的精神陶冶。
description.en:
This course enlightens students on the art, the arlists and the masterworks of seal cutting. Form the appreciation of great works, students sharpen the understanding of the versatile beauty and skills exerted in seal cutting.
Seal cutting is a unique form of art in China. It is commonly applied in signets, and extensively connected with calligraphy and painting stampings and other artistic performance. Therefore, the understanding of seal cutting is supposed to be an inevitable way to unveil the curtain of Chinese art palace. Students are expected to work out the composition of seal cutting within centimeters;hence,their concentration and deliberation can be spontaneously molded.

description.zh: 本課程有系統概括性闡述動態地球科學的基本知識和理論。課程內容包括:地球簡介、地球在天體間的位置、地貌、全球熱量平衡、氣溫、水氣、降雨、風、氣旋、氣候、天氣、生態系統、水文、土壤、地球材料、岩石圈、板塊構造運動、火山、風化作用、塊體運動、淡水、流水地形、地形與岩石構造、風與浪地形、冰川地形、冰川期、土壤與生物等。
description.en: The contents of the course titled " INTRODUCTION TO EARTH SCIENCE " include : the earth; our place in the sun, geomorphology, the earth's global energy balance, air temperature, atmospheric moisture and precipitation, winds and global circulation, weather systems, global climates, global ecosystems, hydrology, global soils, earth materials, the lithosphere and plate tectonics, volcanic and tectonic landforms; weathering and mass erosion, fresh water of the continents; landforms made by running water, landforms and rock structure; landforms made by waves and wind; glacial landforms and the ice age; soil and biology.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 本課程目標如下：（一）以心理學為基礎，探討人類生活各面向的知識；（二）建立學生生活行為的技能；（三）促使學生建立自己積極的價值體系。  本課程內容涵蓋人類的個體發展、學習方式、動機、情緒、態度、人格、兩性、愛情、家庭、育兒、健康管理、社會行為等生活面的相關行為。  本課程採學生中心教學法，以啟發法、小組討論、創造式發表等方式授課，藉以活潑學生的思考並增加學生上台練習的機會。
description.en: The objectives of this course are : (1)By basing on the psychology   to guide our students to discuss the variant facets of their lives. (2)To establish the students' good skills to deal with their own lives. (3)To found the students' positive value systems .  This course includes the human behaviors of individual development , learning strategies, motivations, emotion, attitudes, personality, social interaction, religious lives, love, bisexual interaction, family lives, children cultivation , and etc. This course uses the learner-centered instructing strategies. The methods of discovery learning, teams discussion, creative teaching , and etc. will be adopted, in order to excite the students to do deep thought and give them the opportunities to show their efforts and achievements themselves.

name.en: Medical Trend in the New Era

description.zh: 本課程目標：旨在讓學生認識未來醫療走向，掌握趨勢，同時由醫療之觀點，對學生之健康觀作心的新詮釋，並且讓學生實際地學習實用的救命術，重新探討新生命之價值。本課程內容涵蓋：1.新醫療關係與諮詢、2.如何與醫師對話、3.高關注照護醫療倫理、4.掌握生命力、5.新人類通病、6.領袖特質發展之醫療觀、7.善用醫療資源網路、8.未來基因新療法、9.由健保財務危機看新發展潮流、10.急症新趨勢與預防、11.如何自我建診、12.親子醫療新方向、13.健康全方位人格發展新趨勢-4Q學習、14.生命奇蹟-心肺復甦術理論與演練、15.醫療市場與策略之新趨勢。本課程授課方式：口頭講授、課堂討論、專題演講、情境實習演練。
description.en: This course aims to acquaint students with the new trend of medical treatment. From a medical perspective, students will be furnished with new ideas about health.  With practical training and application, students will have a better understanding of life values.The contents of this course include: (1) New perspective on medical relations and consultation (2) How to talk to doctors  (3) Medical Ethics on intensive care (4) The mastering of your life-force (5) The common failing of the new generation (6) A medical observation on leadership qualities (7) How to make use of the internet resources (9) Financial crisis caused by health insurance and the future development (10) The new idea about emergency cases and their prevention (11) Self-exam on health (12) New medical theory on parent-child treatment (13) 4Q-multi-dimensional development of personality (14) Miracles-the theory and practice of CPR (15) New trend on the medical market and strategy.Teaching method: Lecture, discussion, spe

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control,  Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special project is discussed and together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。熔接概念、熔接方法介紹、各種熔接特性、熔銲人員資格及熔接檢驗、熔接控制及熔接規範(WPS)。
description.en: Introduction of Welding Codes, Fundamentals of Welding, Welding Processes, Welding Equipment, Metals and Their Weldability, Evaluation of Welds, Welding Procedure Specifications (WPS) and Qualification.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。品質管制之基本觀念、應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質、管制圖、抽樣原理、品質成本、品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 複習矩陣及向量、狀態空間描述法、求解狀態空間方程式、可控制性及可觀察性、穩定性分析、狀態變數回饋系統的設計、簡介最佳控制、簡介強健控制。
description.en: Review of matrices and vectors, state space representation of control systems, the solution of the state space equations, controllability and observability, stability analysis, design of state variable feedback systems, optimal control systems, and robust control systems.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同方法分析(如能量法及Castigliano定理)、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件(如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等以及實例分析。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods(Energy method & Castigliano theorem ), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains and Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs and analysis of expansions.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。切削加工概論、影響切削之因素、切削力學、切削熱影響、刀具材料、刀具磨耗與壽命、切屑控制、切削動態分析、切削經濟學、切削液及表面粗度、切削新技術簡介。
description.en: Introduction to Machining Technology, Parameters Affecting Metal Machining, Mechanics of Metal Machining, The Temperature Induced by Metal Machining, Tool Material, Tool Wear and Life, Chip Control, The Dynamic Control, The Economics of Metal Machining, The Fluids and Surface Roughness, Introduction to New Technology.

description.zh: (A)熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗(損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗(90°彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗(升力、阻力係數)。
description.en:
(A) Thermal Lab.

Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. 

(B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.

Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹製造流程編排、可程式控制系統、資料傳輸及局部迴路系統、數值控制、數值控制編程、工業機器人、人工智慧、整合製造系統（CIM）。
description.en: Manufacturing Process Planning, Programmable Control System, Data-Communication and Local-Area-Network System, Numerical Control, Programming for NC Machining, Industrial Robot, Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Integrated Manufacturing System.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。經選定後之題目在第一學期修完時如欲換題目時須在第一學期成績打出後，再徵求原來及新接手老師都同意才可更換題目。
description.en: The topic of the special project is discussed and decided together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester. The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。探討材料強度、彈性塑性及建立理論之數學架構，探討金屬的流動性與破壞，及機械行為所須之冶金基礎，金屬成形時其相關冶金及機械因子及機械實驗之冶金變數。
description.en: The Strength of Materials, Elastic and Plastic Behavior of Crystals (Concept of Stress and Strain), Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanisms, Fracture, The Application of Material Tests (Tension, Hardness Torsion, Fracture, Fatigue), Brittle Fracture and Impact Testing, and Fundamentals of Metal Working.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002016或負責教授同意。流體機械總論，輪機機械之歐拉理論總升程、設計原理、相似定律及比速率，水輪機及各種泵之升程、功率、效率及損失，泵原動機功率設計、特性曲線、孔蝕現像、水鎚作用、軸之平衡。空氣機械、流體聯結器與扭拒變速器、油壓及氣力機具。
description.en: Introduction and Classification of Fluid Machines, Turbomachinery Analysis (Including the Angular MomentumPrinciple, Euler's Turbomachine Equation, Velocity Polygon Analysis), Performance Analysis and Specific Speed, Similarity Rules, Cavitation and Net Positive Suction Head (NPSH), Introduction to Water Turbine, Introduction to Pumps, Introduction to Air Machinery, Introduction to Fluid Coupling and Fluid Torque Converter, Introduction to Oil Hydraulic and Pneumatic Machinery or Equipments.

description.zh:
本課程有系統介紹機械工程常用之應用軟體，於不同學期或不同班級教授各不同應用軟體，以提供需要同學選擇。本課程之應用軟體涵括：﹙1﹚數學類：如MATLAB、Mathematica、Macyma等；﹙2﹚工程分析類：如ANSYS、COSMOS、NASTRAN等；﹙3﹚動態分析類：如
Working Model/Motion、COSMOS/Motion等；﹙4﹚影像處理類：如Adobe/Photoshop、MATLAB；﹙5﹚介面類：如LABVIEW；﹙6﹚其他：以物件式語言開發應用工具等。
description.en:
The course is to systematically introduce application software packages to mechanical engineering students.  In order to offer more options to the interested students, there are several packages are included in the course.  And, different packages may be taught in different semesters or in different class.  The software packages include the following categories: 
(1) Math: MATLAB, Mathematica, Macyma, etc. 
(2) CAE:  ANSYS, COSMOS, NASTRAN, etc. 
(3) Motion: Working Model/Motion, COSMOS/Motion, etc. 
(4) Image Processing: MALAB/Image, Adobe/Photoshop, etc. 
(5) Interface: LABVIEW, etc. 
Miscellaneous: use any Object-Oriented languages to develop ME application tools.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a Particle, Kinetics of a Particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
description.en:
Prerequisite: ME111 or Consent of Instructor
Introduction of the deformation, strain and stress of structures (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, and Matrices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: CAD套裝軟體介紹、CAD數值技巧、二維畫圖、三維畫圖、曲面模型、實體模型建立、動畫之製作、最佳化設計、整合性之CAD系統及專題。
description.en: Introduction of CAD software package. Review of Numerical technique for CAD.2-D Graphics, 3-D Graphics, surface modeling, solid modeling. Design optimization, Integrated CAD systems and Animation project.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 銜接工程圖學及基本幾何學的觀念，以繪製機械之零件圖、立體圖、剖面圖與組合圖，並能正確的標註尺度、表面加工符號及公差與配合。
description.en: Connecting the fundamental Engineering graphics and the geometrical drawing technology to mechanical parts and assembly drawings with emphasizes on mastering the intersections and development theorem, Steel Structures, Hydraulic and Fluid Systems and Related Mechanical Drawing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。依所欠專長及發展專題需要選項實習，每學期以兩項為原則，項次含：1.機工實習：車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工等。2.鑄鍛實習：鑄造或鍛造等。3.焊接實習：鈑金及氣焊、電弧焊實習。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Contents: (1) Machining Shop5
          (2) Casting or Forging Shop
          (3) Welding Shop
Students, depending on their own specialties and interests, shall choose at least two categories in one semester.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意
第一部份（電工原理）：電路元件、直流電阻電路、直流電容電路、電磁感應、直流電感   
電路、直流電機、交流電路、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、
同步電動機、電工儀表設備。
第二部分（電工實驗）：三用電表量測、電磁開關啟動法、電動機之順序控制、RC電路
之量測、感應電動機之Ｙ－△降壓啟動法、直流馬達與直流發電機、、繞線式感應馬達、
直流伺服馬達速度及位置控制、變頻器與感應馬達速度控制。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Part I (Electrical Engineering Principles):Circuit components, DC resistance circuit, DC capacitor circuit, Electro-magnet induction, DC inductor circuit, DC electric machines, AC circuit, Transformers, Three-phase AC, Three-phase induction motors, Single-phase induction motors, Synchronous motors, Electrical instrument and meters.
Part II (Electrical Engineering Lab.):Multi-meter measurement, Magnetic switch starting, Sequential control of motor, Measurement of RC circuit, Ｙ-△ Starting of induction motor, DC Motor and DC generator, Wound induction motor, Speed and position control of DC servo motor, Inverter and speed control of induction motor.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。計算機之硬體基本架構及週邊設備、計算機程式設計架構、運算法則、流程圖、輔助記憶體、Windows簡介、中文輸入、輸等方式、數據通訊與網路、PC結構、BASIC語言等。
description.en:
Prerequisite: None
Hardware and Peripheral Equipment of a Computer, Introduction to MS-DOS And operation systems, Input/Output of Chinese Character, BASIC Language, Algorithm and Flow Chart for Programming, Data Communication and Network.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 銜接工程圖學及基本幾何學的觀念，以繪製機械之零件圖、立體圖、剖面圖與組合圖，並能正確的標註尺度、表面加工符號及公差與配合。
description.en: Connecting the fundamental Engineering graphics and the geometrical drawing technology to mechanical parts and assembly drawings with emphasizes on mastering the intersections and development theorem, Steel Structures, Hydraulic and Fluid Systems and Related Mechanical Drawing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。依所欠專長及發展專題需要選項實習，每學期以兩項為原則，項次含：1.機工實習：車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工等。2.鑄鍛實習：鑄造或鍛造等。3.焊接實習：鈑金及氣焊、電弧焊實習。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Contents: (1) Machining Shop5
          (2) Casting or Forging Shop
          (3) Welding Shop
Students, depending on their own specialties and interests, shall choose at least two categories in one semester.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意
第一部份（電工原理）：電路元件、直流電阻電路、直流電容電路、電磁感應、直流電感   
電路、直流電機、交流電路、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、
同步電動機、電工儀表設備。
第二部分（電工實驗）：三用電表量測、電磁開關啟動法、電動機之順序控制、RC電路
之量測、感應電動機之Ｙ－△降壓啟動法、直流馬達與直流發電機、、繞線式感應馬達、
直流伺服馬達速度及位置控制、變頻器與感應馬達速度控制。
description.en:
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
Part I (Electrical Engineering Principles):Circuit components, DC resistance circuit, DC capacitor circuit, Electro-magnet induction, DC inductor circuit, DC electric machines, AC circuit, Transformers, Three-phase AC, Three-phase induction motors, Single-phase induction motors, Synchronous motors, Electrical instrument and meters.
Part II (Electrical Engineering Lab.):Multi-meter measurement, Magnetic switch starting, Sequential control of motor, Measurement of RC circuit, Ｙ-△ Starting of induction motor, DC Motor and DC generator, Wound induction motor, Speed and position control of DC servo motor, Inverter and speed control of induction motor.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。計算機之硬體基本架構及週邊設備、計算機程式設計架構、運算法則、流程圖、輔助記憶體、Windows簡介、中文輸入、輸等方式、數據通訊與網路、PC結構、BASIC語言等。
description.en:
Prerequisite: None
Hardware and Peripheral Equipment of a Computer, Introduction to MS-DOS And operation systems, Input/Output of Chinese Character, BASIC Language, Algorithm and Flow Chart for Programming, Data Communication and Network.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。有書面報告。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of  special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 直流機數學模式與分析，直流機控制器設計，感應機數學模式與分析，感應機控制器設計，同步機數學模式與分析，同步機控制器設計。
description.en:
mathematical models of DC machines,controller design of
DC machines,mathematical models of induction motors,drivers
design of induction motors ,controller design of induction motors ,mathematical models of synchronous machines,
controller design of synchronous machines.

description.zh: 各種時域響應之電腦繪圖，矩陣各項特性分析與應用，根值軌跡圖，波德圖，奈奎士圖，PID控制器之設計，Lead-Lag補償器之設計，控制器時域及頻域分析，控制器在狀態空間之設計，實例探討，書報研讀。
description.en:
Course Title:Automatic Control Practice
Description:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts of
control systems and the mathematical background, second, state the
transfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,
discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, and
forth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques and
frequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the character
of control systems, Finally, the design of control system will be
introduced.

description.zh:
一、電腦網路概述
二、Internet
三、TANET BBS
四、Gopher
五、Unix介紹
六、Unix指令
七、Mail
八、Ftp
九、News、WWW
十、Novell Netware
description.en:
1.TANet BBS
2.NCSA Telnet
3.UNIX Concepts, Commands
4.Mail, News
5.Ptp, Archie
6.other Internet resources
7.Network hardware
8.Drivers, Network protocol
9.LAN
10.Dial up service

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1)標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2)連續系統的數學分析 (3)離散系統的數學分析 (4)拉氏轉換分析 (5)Z-轉換分析 (6)傅立葉分析 (7)工程應用。
description.en:
course title : signals and systems
description : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

description.zh: (1)向量分析 (2)靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3)拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4)靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5)電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en:
Course Title:Electromagnetism
Description:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias on
its Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts
(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)
the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagnetic
field and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.
Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機 (7)感應機 (8)同步機。
description.en:
Course Title:Electric Machinery
Description:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,
DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,
synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 實驗室設備與儀器介紹，步進馬達實驗，直流伺服馬達實驗，動力計實驗（EC&DC），感應電動機變頻特性實驗，變壓器類應用（Slidac，IVR等特性），同步機滑差實驗，固態華德黎翁那式速率控制特性，電機參數測量與模擬。
description.en:
Course Title:Electrical Machinery Lab.
Description:This course offers the students an experience in the field
of electric machinery. It includes no-load characteristic test, torque
measurement and parallel operation of generators, etc.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en:
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en:
1.History and evolution 

2.Process concepts

3.ASynchronous concurrent processes

4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt

5.Real storage management

6.Virtual storage organization and management 

7.Processor scheduling 

8.Disk mansgement

9.Network and security

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en:
Course Title:Linear Electronics
Description:This course is to study the characteristics of the
semiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en:
Course Title:Mechatronics Practice
Description:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronic
techniques and corresponding parts/components

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.en:
Course Title:Electrical Machinery Lab.
Description:This course offers the students an experience in the field
of electric machinery. It includes no-load characteristic test, torque
measurement and parallel operation of generators, etc.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之VLSI設計，使用MSI與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI之設計與測試技巧，各種CALD軟體工具介紹。
description.en:
1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic
2.VLSI realizations of combination logic
3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.
4.Components of sequential systems
5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: (1)作業系統簡介 (2)工作觀念之介紹：異步及平行程式處理(3)記憶體管理：實際及虛擬記憶體之管理 (4)處理機管理：工作排序及多元處理 (5)輔助儲存體之管理：磁碟排序，檔案及資料庫 (6)網路作業系統及安全性(含分散式資料處理)(7)範例研究：DOS，UNIX Windows NT。
description.en:
1.History and evolution 

2.Process concepts

3.ASynchronous concurrent processes

4.Desdlock and indefinite postponrmrnt

5.Real storage management

6.Virtual storage organization and management 

7.Processor scheduling 

8.Disk mansgement

9.Network and security

description.zh: 簡介，二極體電路，雙極性電晶體電路，低頻小信號放大器，場效電晶體電路，功率放大器，回授放大器，差動放大器，多級放大器，運算放大器，頻率響應分析與設計，振盪器及濾波器分析與設計，固態半導體理論。
description.en:
Course Title:Linear Electronics
Description:This course is to study the characteristics of the
semiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits.

description.zh: 複數，可分析函數，基本複數函數，複數積分，數列，餘數與極點，函數之映射，保角映射，複數函數應用。
description.en:
1.Complex Numbers

2.Complex Functions

3.Harmonic Functions

4.Complex Integration

5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 

6.Complex Power Series

7.Laurent Series,Residues

8.Conformal Mapping

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en:
Course Title:Mechatronics Practice
Description:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronic
techniques and corresponding parts/components

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh:
集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯
電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及
弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻
率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，
拉式轉換。
description.en:
Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallel
circuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuit
analysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuits
PSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms

description.zh:
(1)電腦數字系統 (2)8088系列組合語言 (3)8088系統接線
、時序、及故障排除 (4)8088中斷及中斷應用 (5)數位介面
 (6)各種記憶體 (7)DMA資料傳輸。
description.en:
Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en:
This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 
1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.
2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.
3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.
4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.
5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。
description.en:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
1. 程式語言類別
2. 物件導向與資料抽象化
3. 類別與方法
4. 訊息，實例與初始化
5. 繼承
6. 靜態與動態繫結
7. 多型性
8. 發展環境及工具
9. 物件導向程式語言C++,Java,Smalltake簡介
10.應用實例
description.en:
1. Programming Language Paradigms
2. Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction
3. Classes and Methods
4. Messages,Instances,and Initialization
5. Inheritance
6. Static and Dynamic Binding
7. Polymorphism
8. Environment and Tools
9. Introduction to C++,Java,and Smalltalk
10.Case Study

國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh:
集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯
電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及
弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻
率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，
拉式轉換。
description.en:
Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallel
circuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuit
analysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuits
PSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms

description.zh:
(1)電腦數字系統 (2)8088系列組合語言 (3)8088系統接線
、時序、及故障排除 (4)8088中斷及中斷應用 (5)數位介面
 (6)各種記憶體 (7)DMA資料傳輸。
description.en:
Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

Course Title:Microprocessor
Description:This course introduces the working principles of computer.
It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theory
and appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction of
general microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assembly
language program and module program, instruction addressing mode,
instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. More
specifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processing
configuration are also discussed here. New topics will be added if
needed.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en:
Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en:
This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 
1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.
2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.
3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.
4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.
5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh:
線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場
效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體(MOSFET)
；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金
氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大
器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器
；振盪器。

Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.
Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PN
diode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2
concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing a
discrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point is
discussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and used
to calculate the performance of low frequency single stage and
cascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, its
characteristics and applications are described.

description.zh:
1. 程式語言類別
2. 物件導向與資料抽象化
3. 類別與方法
4. 訊息，實例與初始化
5. 繼承
6. 靜態與動態繫結
7. 多型性
8. 發展環境及工具
9. 物件導向程式語言C++,Java,Smalltake簡介
10.應用實例
description.en:
1. Programming Language Paradigms
2. Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction
3. Classes and Methods
4. Messages,Instances,and Initialization
5. Inheritance
6. Static and Dynamic Binding
7. Polymorphism
8. Environment and Tools
9. Introduction to C++,Java,and Smalltalk
10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh:
DOS命令，物件導向程式語言Turbo C++整合發展環境，條件
與迴圈，陣列與指標，函數，結構，類別與物件，檔案，溢
載及繼承關係，文字視窗的應用，繪圖的應用，資料處理的
應用，資料結構的應用，數位信號處理的應用，數值分析的
應用。
description.en:
Course: Title:Computer Program
Description:The course intends to have students to be familiar with
computer language programming. It also introduces different computer
languages with the purpose of developing student's capability of
designing a complete program.

description.zh:
布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏
輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
description.en:
Course Title:Logic Design
Description:This course offers students a basic concept about how to
design a logic circuit. Our approach is to follow the basic framework
of switching theory. we hope, however, to motivate the student by
presenting examples of the many problems which appear repeatedly in
the design of digital systems.

description.zh:
基本邏輯閘特性，算術演算回路，正反器及其應用回路，各
種同步及非同步計數回路，解碼器及顯示回路。
description.en:
Course Title:Logic Design
Description:This course offers students a basic concept about how to
design a logic circuit. Our approach is to follow the basic framework
of switching theory. we hope, however, to motivate the student by
presenting examples of the many problems which appear repeatedly in
the design of digital systems.

description.zh:
80x86 暫存器及其定址法，除錯程式Debug及Code View用法
，指令集，副程式，巨集指令，假指令(組譯指示)，鍵盤控
制與螢幕處理，磁碟結構及檔案管理，其它BIOS及DOS常式。
description.en: 1. Development process of assembly language2. Debug3. Masm program architecture and directives4. Instruction of 80x86 microprocessor5. Interrupt subroutine6. Screen control7. Sound control8. Disk R/W and file processing9. Tsr 10. Linkage between high level language and assembly

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
