（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係
（２）視窗環境
（３）網路環境
（４）整合設計
學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en:
To familiarize the student with the environments,
methodologies,and principles of application software
design.
Topics include :
1.Run-time environments
2.Window environments
3.Networking environments
4.Integrated design
The student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh:
1.複數
2.複函數 
3.諧和函數
4.複數積分
5.柯西積分理論
6.複冪級數
7.洛冉級數,餘數
8.保角寫像
description.en:
1.Complex Numbers
2.Complex Functions
3.Harmonic Functions
4.Complex Integration
5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 
6.Complex Power Series
7.Laurent Series,Residues
8.Conformal Mapping

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Integrated Circuits

description.zh:
本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來分析與模擬類比及數位積体電路,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路的能力,課程內容包念：
1. 電腦輔助設計積体電路介紹
2. 類比積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( SPICE Design center )
3. 數位積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( Viewlogic )
4. PLD的認識與介紹
5. FPGA ( Xilinx )的設計
6. 專題設計
description.en:
This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated 
circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore,the student have the design capability of integrated.The contents of this 
course :
1.introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 
2.Introduction to the computer-aided deaign of analysis  
  integrated circuits(SPICE ,Deaign Center)and computer-
  exercise
3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits(Viewlogic)and computer-exercise
4.Introduction to the PLD
5.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise
6.Project.

description.zh:
1.輸入輸出工作：非同步匯流排(Asynchronous Bus)，仲裁設計(Arbitration)，同步匯流排(Synchronous Bus)，程式化I/O與直接記憶進出(Programmed I/O and DMA)，I/O通道與I/O處理器(I/O Channels and I/O Processors)，
2.平行處理(Parallel  Processing)：管線系統(Pipelined Processor)，運算管線(Arithmetic Pipeline)，指令管線(Instruction Pipeline)，矩陣處理器(Array Processor)，多處理器系統(MIMD)。
description.en:
1.I/O operations:Asynchronous bus,Aribitration,Synchronous bus,Programmed I/O and DMA, I/O channel and I/O processors
2.Parallel Processing :Piplined processor,Arithmetic pipline,Instruction pipline ,Array processor,MIMD

To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :
1.Electromafnetic Model.
2.The Vector Analysis.
3.Static Electric Fields.
4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.
5.Steady Eletric Currents.
6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.
7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.
8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.
9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.
10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.
11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en:
1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling
2.Frequcy response of discrete time system
3.IIR digital filter design
4.FIR digital filter design
5.Discrete fourier transform
6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 1.光纖概論，2.光纖波導，3.光纖傳輸特特性，4.光纖與光纜，5.光纖連接，6.光源與檢光器，7.光纖系統，8.光纖量測，9.光纖應用與未來發展。
description.en:
1.Introduction 
2.Waveguide of optical fibers
3.Propagation in optical fibers
4.Optical fibers and opotical cable
5.Fiber connectors
6.Light sources and detectors
7.Optical fiber communication systems
8.Measurement of optical fiber communication systems
9.Applications

description.zh:
本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：
1.簡介
2.信號與系統
3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊
4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶
5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變
6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變
7.數位通訊簡介
對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en:
Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include
1.Introduction 
2.Signals and Systems
3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie
4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB
5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM
6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM
7.Intorduction to Digital Communication 
Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en:
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1.電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2.電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3.一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4.穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5.電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en:
1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis
2.Resistve circuit 
3.Kirchhoff laws
4.Thevenin and Norton theorem
5.First and second order circuit
6.Node and loop analysis
7.Steady state response and analysis
8.SPICE tool

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en:
The experiment covers the basic architecture and application 
of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:
1.The usage of PC
2.The usage of microcomputer training machine
3.Logic analysis
4.The design and debug of assembly language
5.ROM/RAM design
6.I/O design and control 
7.A/D, D/A design
8.PC interfacing design
9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en:
1.Introduction to microcomputer
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set
4.Assemblylanguage programming
5.Interfacing circuits
6.ROM/RAM interface
7.I/O operations
8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en:
The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise
1.Introduction 
2.Fundamentals of optics
3.Laser principles
4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams
5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh:
１.組合分析
２.機率理論
３.隨機變數
４.隨機變數函數
５.機率分佈
６.期望值性質
７.樣本分佈
８.假設檢定
９.線性迴歸分析
１０.變異數分析
description.en:
1.Combinatonal Analysis
2.Pribability Theory
3.Random Variables
4.Functions of Random variables
5.Probability Distribution 
6.Properties of Expectation  
7.Sampling Distribution 
8.Tests of Hypotheses
9.Linear Regression Analysis
10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en:
1.The coverage of technology management. 
2.Technology management model. 
3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.
4.The management of technology projects. 
5.The management of technology marketing. 
6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en:
1.Programming Language Paradigms  
2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  
3.Classes and Methods 
4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 
5.Inheritance  
6.Static and Dynamic Binding
7.Polymorphism  
8.Environment and Tools  
9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 
10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en:
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1.電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2.電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3.一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4.穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5.電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en:
1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis
2.Resistve circuit 
3.Kirchhoff laws
4.Thevenin and Norton theorem
5.First and second order circuit
6.Node and loop analysis
7.Steady state response and analysis
8.SPICE tool

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en:
The experiment covers the basic architecture and application 
of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:
1.The usage of PC
2.The usage of microcomputer training machine
3.Logic analysis
4.The design and debug of assembly language
5.ROM/RAM design
6.I/O design and control 
7.A/D, D/A design
8.PC interfacing design
9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en:
1.Introduction to microcomputer
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set
4.Assemblylanguage programming
5.Interfacing circuits
6.ROM/RAM interface
7.I/O operations
8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en:
The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise
1.Introduction 
2.Fundamentals of optics
3.Laser principles
4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams
5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh:
１.組合分析
２.機率理論
３.隨機變數
４.隨機變數函數
５.機率分佈
６.期望值性質
７.樣本分佈
８.假設檢定
９.線性迴歸分析
１０.變異數分析
description.en:
1.Combinatonal Analysis
2.Pribability Theory
3.Random Variables
4.Functions of Random variables
5.Probability Distribution 
6.Properties of Expectation  
7.Sampling Distribution 
8.Tests of Hypotheses
9.Linear Regression Analysis
10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en:
1.Programming Language Paradigms  
2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  
3.Classes and Methods 
4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 
5.Inheritance  
6.Static and Dynamic Binding
7.Polymorphism  
8.Environment and Tools  
9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 
10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 瞭解計算機之硬体組織與資料結構等基本原理及其應用，並介紹各種程式語言特性，內容包括：1.計算機簡介：介紹計算機之演進及計算機之種類與特性，2.計算機系統簡介：介紹計算機系統的組成及軟硬体系統所含概之內容，3.資料的表示法與數字系統：介紹數系及文數字表示法，4.輸出入裝置及儲存体：介紹各種輸出入設備及資料儲存体，5.程式語言與程式設計：介紹各種程式語言結構，及撰寫之方法，6.資料結構：介紹資料在記憶体內之各種排列方法以節省記憶空間及提高存取效率，7.作業系統：介紹各種管理電腦資源的系統軟体及其作業方式，8.檔案與資料庫：介紹各種檔案的類型及資料庫之基本架構，9.資料通訊與計算機網路：介紹資料通訊之種種特性及電腦網路之結構與類別，10.人工智慧：介紹人工智慧基本概念及基本功能
description.en:
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers.
Contents include:
1. Introduction to computer
2. Introduction to computer system
3. Data representation and number system
4. Input/Output and storage device
5. Programming language and design 
6. Data  structure
7. Operating systems
8. File and database systems
9. Data communication and computer networks
10. Artificial intelligence

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以C語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對C語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹C語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C語言與物件導向：介紹C++與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

description.zh:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
description.en:
1.Introductions
2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations
3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers
4.Introduction to Satellite Communications
5.Introduction to Data Communications
6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications
7.Introduction to Telephone System
8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 1.光的粒子與波動特性，2.光線的基本原理，3.光線經介質界面後的性質，4.稜鏡面鏡與透鏡，5.成像系統介紹，6.光欄與視場的討論，7.像差概論，8.光學儀器簡介。
description.en:
1.Photos,wave optics
2.Nature of lights
3.Properties of optical transmissions
4.Prisms and lens
5.Optical imaging system
6.Stops
7.Optical instruments

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en:
1.The coverage of technology management. 
2.Technology management model. 
3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.
4.The management of technology projects. 
5.The management of technology marketing. 
6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數，12.常微分方程。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes : 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series, 12.Ordinary Differential Equation.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 瞭解計算機之硬体組織與資料結構等基本原理及其應用，並介紹各種程式語言特性，內容包括：1.計算機簡介：介紹計算機之演進及計算機之種類與特性，2.計算機系統簡介：介紹計算機系統的組成及軟硬体系統所含概之內容，3.資料的表示法與數字系統：介紹數系及文數字表示法，4.輸出入裝置及儲存体：介紹各種輸出入設備及資料儲存体，5.程式語言與程式設計：介紹各種程式語言結構，及撰寫之方法，6.資料結構：介紹資料在記憶体內之各種排列方法以節省記憶空間及提高存取效率，7.作業系統：介紹各種管理電腦資源的系統軟体及其作業方式，8.檔案與資料庫：介紹各種檔案的類型及資料庫之基本架構，9.資料通訊與計算機網路：介紹資料通訊之種種特性及電腦網路之結構與類別，10.人工智慧：介紹人工智慧基本概念及基本功能
description.en:
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers.
Contents include:
1. Introduction to computer
2. Introduction to computer system
3. Data representation and number system
4. Input/Output and storage device
5. Programming language and design 
6. Data  structure
7. Operating systems
8. File and database systems
9. Data communication and computer networks
10. Artificial intelligence

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以C語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對C語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹C語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C語言與物件導向：介紹C++與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

description.zh:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
description.en:
1.Introductions
2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations
3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers
4.Introduction to Satellite Communications
5.Introduction to Data Communications
6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications
7.Introduction to Telephone System
8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 1.光的粒子與波動特性，2.光線的基本原理，3.光線經介質界面後的性質，4.稜鏡面鏡與透鏡，5.成像系統介紹，6.光欄與視場的討論，7.像差概論，8.光學儀器簡介。

1.Photos,wave optics
2.Nature of lights
3.Properties of optical transmissions
4.Prisms and lens
5.Optical imaging system
6.Stops
7.Optical instruments

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。
description.en: Engineering / management analysis of the economic aspects of public and private project proposals. Decisions involving the expenditure of capital funds. Alternative sources of funds; time value of money; methods of evaluating alternative project.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供管理組學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: This course provides the students the opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供管理組學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: This course provides the students the opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 針對企業管理不同的對象，如經營策略、經營文化、事務管理、預算管理等，以實際個案方式介紹並討論。
description.en: This class will introduce and discuss the application on the following topics: Business strategies, business culture, factory management, budgeting management, etc.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: This course purpose is searching excellence marketing approach, and presents complete of the essential marketing concepts, processes, strategies, and tactics most commonly used by the marketing manager.  Students are enable understanding of the field: marketing management, planning, situations, decisions, actions and issues.

description.zh: 本課程乃是探討如何設計一套電腦系統，使其類似人類行為中具有智慧表現的某些特質，因此本課程的範圍非常廣泛，但大致可涵蓋下列重點，使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、具有理解的能力、具有辨別的能力、具有視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、具有學習、認知分析理解等能力。
description.en: This course discusses how to design a computer system, which contains human intelligence. The subjects include: problem solving and searching, intelligent agent, reasoning, recognition, computer vision, knowledge representation, machine learning, perception.

description.zh: 探討物料管理實務、物流系統、存量管制模式、物料需求規畫及看板生產方式。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and practice of material management, the flow of materials system, inventory control model, materials requirements planning and Kanban production system.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems.  The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 從企業經理人的觀點來操討談判的有關問題，旨在提供學生對談判佑識的了解，並熟悉談判的實務運用。課程重心涵蓋談判的本質與觀念性架構，談判的理論與模型，談判的規劃、執行與控制，談判的策略與技能。上課方式操研討為主，並操分組報告與討論。
description.en: The viewpoint of business manager focus into the issues of negotiation. The objectives of this course are to provide understanding some of the core concepts of the negotiation and to acquaint application approach of the practice. The negotiation topics cover: (1) nature, conceptual, framework, theory and model and (2) to analyze, plan, strategy, tactics, and implement successful negotiation. This can povide groups discussion and improve speaking skills.

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 介紹經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of Economics and analytical techniques.  Which includes supply and demand, marketing balance analysis, production and cost, GNP and economic welfare, international trade theories, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。由於本系分兩組教學，因應之課程內容分別為：管理組：矩陣、方程式之解、行列式、向量、微分方程式及應用問題等。工程組：矩陣方程式之解、行列式、向量及向量空間等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the linear algebra by using several different methods to solve the linear dependent equations and to build up the fundamental knowledge of linear programming and Operation Research. Two groups instruct the contents of this course. For the engineering group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors, differential equations and its implementation are included. For the management group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors and vector spaces are included.

description.zh: 探討工作研究涵蓋之各項技術：時間研究、動作研究、程序分析、作業分析、影片分析、工作抽查、標準工時與效率管理、動作經濟原理、生產線平衡、生產力衡量等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with a resource which describes the techniques and procedures of motion and time study .It contains: techniques of methods study, work station design, PTS, stop watch time study, standard data, assembly line balancing.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生經由實習去熟練下列各項技術：時間研究、動作研究、程序分析、作業分析、影片分析、工作抽查、標準工時與效率管理、動作經濟原理、生產線平衡、生產力衡量等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide students with a practice about the techniques and procedures of motion and time study.  It contains techniques of methods study, work station design, PTS, stop watch time Study, standard data, assembly line balancing.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理實習。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course let the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹組織內個人之行為以及團體間之種種管理；課程之內容大綱如下：組織行為之功能、組織行為之基礎－個人部份、組織行為之核心、組織動力學、組織行為之過程與結構。
description.en: This course introduces individual behavior in an organization and the management among the organizations.  The course is consisted of functions of the organizational behavior (OB), fundamental of OB for individual, core of (OB), and processes and structure of (OB).

description.zh: 傳統的資訊管理技術偏重於管理文數字型態的資訊，隨著電腦軟體與網際網路技術的成熟，多媒體資料如聲音、圖片、影像、動畫、圖形等己經成為資訊表現的重要形式，有效的管理多媒體資訊變成十分的重要，本課程將介紹各種多媒體資訊系統的軟體、硬體技術與資料表現方式，並且介紹全球資訊網、企業內網路、分散式系統、超媒體系統的資料處理與管理的方式，我們也將介紹多媒體資訊管理技術在商業自動化與生產系統的應用。
description.en:
Management of multimedia information is very important for nowadays business. The multimedia information management course is to study the multimedia information management techniques, including software and hardware, and hardware, and study their applications on internet, intranet, commerce automation and production systems.The course covers the following topics.
1. Representation and storage of multimedia information
2. Multimedia software and hardware introduction
3. Multimedia information management systems
4. Distributed multimedia information management techniques
5. Hypermedia information management
6. Internet information management
7. Intranet information management
8. Multimedia techniques on commerce automation
9. Multimedia techniques on production systems

description.zh:
迴歸分析是一種探討變量間相互關係及建立模;式的統計技術。其內容包括：
簡單直線迴歸與相關，模式正確性的衡量，複迴歸分析，多項式迴歸模式，變量的選擇及模式建立，共線，迴歸分析應用上的注意事項等。配合電子計算機及套裝轉軟體等工具，從事資料描述，參數估計，預測模式及控制等方面的應用。
description.en:
Regression analysis is a statistical technique for investigating and modeling the relationship 
between variables.This course provides:Simple linear regression and correlation,Measures of model adequacy,Multiple regression,Polynomial regression models,Variable selection and model building,Multicollinearity and Topics in the use of regression analysis.The computer and software packages is a necessary tool.Regression models are used for several purposes as:Data description,Parameters estimation,Prediction model and Control.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topic includes: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 主要敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容包含：工業組織、人事管理、工廠規劃、成本分析與控制、工業設備、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全等，期使學生對工業工程與管理整體作業有一概括性的認識。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, const analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 介紹工程及管理等相關套裝軟體之使用，以便應用此軟體工具處理相關資料，包含 Word Processor ， Word ， Lotus， Window ， SAS ， Power point 等。
description.en: Introduction to the software package frequently used, including MS Word, Excel, Power Point, etc.

description.zh: 介紹 Internet 常用的軟體Netscape、Internet Explore、Email、BBS、Gopher、FTP、Telnet、Winzip、Netmeeting…等。
description.en: Introduction of the software commonly need in internet,  Netscape, Internet Explore, Email, BBS, Usenet News, Gopher, FTP, Telnet, Archie, Winzip, Netmeeting, and so on.

description.zh:
電腦繪圖應用：
本課程適用於一般大專之電腦繪圖課程。其目的在說明電腦繪圖原理之基本觀念，及其相關之應用。本課程授課主題包括：電腦繪圖系統簡介、二度空間轉換問題、視窗、繪圖區域之處理、互動式電腦繪圖系統設計、三度空間轉換問題、隱藏現方法。
description.en:
Computer Graphics Applications： 
This is an undergraduate course dealing with computer graphics.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of computer graphics theory and its applications.The main topics of this course are introduction
of computer graphic system,two-dimemtional transformation,windowing,segments,interactive graphic system
design,three-dimemtional transformation,hidden line methods.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創
新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一
設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義
、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型
製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專
業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh:
講授應用於工程上之經濟分析及決策理論，並介紹報酬率、現值、及
資金成本之計算與分析。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and applications of engineering economics in the process of marketing strategy. The nature of remuneration, capital, and depreciation will be introduced and calculated in case examples.

description.zh: 探討家具成本之構成要素：原料、人力、製造及銷管費用等項；研究定價策略，計算損益平衡，分析並控制家具之製造成本。此外，亦將論及工程經濟，以便各種製造資源：原料、人力及機器獲得最經濟利用。
description.en: This course will acquaint the student with the techniques of pricing a piece of furniture including materials, labor, overhead, and administrative expenses. To calculate "Break-even" Point, to analyze and control cost elements of manufacturing furniture, with special emphasis on economic utilization of materials, manpower and machines.

description.zh: 以專題設計方式，訓練學生獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練完整之設計過程。學生經由分組或獨自完成一設計主題。上學期課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展及草模提交等為教學內容，下學期則進行細部設計、模型製作、專刊編輯、展示佈置以及設計報告提交等為教學內容,以培養專業設計之能力。
description.en: Studio in product design for the senior. Students are expected to exhibit a full range of professional competence and facility in designing advanced products and component complexes of broad scope. All phases of each project design are brought to a professional level under supervision of the director. This course puts emphasis on presentation techniques, including verbal, visual, and written. A project report is required.

description.zh:
本課程之目的係在教導學生有關工業包裝，包裝材料之特性與運用、
包裝之結構與試驗方法及包裝之標準化、運輸、管理等基本知識以及
設計要領。
description.en: The aim of this course is to familiarize the students with the basic technology of industrial packaging,packaging engineering and packaging management and to train them in the techniques of protectional package design and managment so that they may continue their advanced study or apply what they learn to practice.

description.zh:
應用科學方法研究分析：人─環境之傳達模式，提高視覺及工作效率
，減少災害發生機會，提高生活品質，連貫及涵蓋視覺平面、產品、
建築及都市景觀等各種設計領域以整體觀點進行研究分析及個人的設
計練習。
description.en: Landscape, from a more comprehensive viewpoint, involves with either natural environment or humanistic expression. The universal knowledge and technology brought about the significant impact to environment and the tendency of universal homogeneity. Looking for more regional reflected approach to landscape design has been a concern in searching for regionally sound landscape. Landscape practice in Taiwan is unexceptional to this phenomenon at all. To underscore the regional approach the course includes the issues below; 1. Vision and fallacy of contemporary landscape design 2. Rationale of the regional planning and design 3. The body of regional design in landscape 4. Method of regional approach to landscape design 5. The practice of regional landscape design

description.zh:
本課程為設計理論的講授，其內容包含溝通基本觀念、感知心理、記
號理論、情報理論、傳達理論等之理論架構及應用模式。
description.en: The study of design methodology, including the theory structure and application module of the basic communication knowledge, conception psychology, symbolization theory, information theory and communication theory.

description.zh:
完整且有系統的介紹設計實務工作的活動，從規劃設立、執行、管理
、協調及最終之提交檢討。並以各專案實例說明設計的過程所遭遇之
問題點，以及如何因應之道。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a design case, from proposal setup, achievement, management, negotiation and the final review, accompanying with the problems and solutions encountering in the actual projects.

description.zh: 以pentium級個人電腦搭配設計軟體之使用，了解3D高階軟體本身內部運作的結構與建構、更改模型的完整觀念，並了解同部工程中建構模型資料的方式。藉由實習培養學生從CAID到CAD/CAM的設計與開發能力。(本課程以Pro-Engineer軟體為例)
description.en: In this computer aided desigh course, we use Pwntium-class PC to run our design software. Our major point is to understansd how the kernel structure and construction of advances 3D software works; to build the complete idea of model's refinement, and to know the way of building model's data in Concurrent Engineering. We cultivate students' design and creating abilities from CAID to CAD/CAM by practices.(In this course we take Pro-Engineer as example)

description.zh: 大自然、大環境的生態，千變萬化，人類欲生存於大自然中，對如何營造最好的生活環境，得從自然生態中去探究。本課程旨在探討大自然的變化原理及其對於人類生存環境的影響，課程著重在其對產品創新設計的明示及隱喻的應用。這是一門研究創新設計與生態的課程。
description.en: The aim of this course is to study ways of implementation of sustainable relation between humans and the environment by designing products that are sustainable to ecology -- easy to recycle, energy saving, safe and accessible to people of all age and gender.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
根基於學生在基本產品設計的學習中所建立之基礎，漸次加深產品設
計在工程技術條件的多元性。企業市場及消費者需求因素的複雜性，
訓練學生以工業設計的方法與技術，在目標條件下解決由多元素及多
因素所構成之產品設計問題，進而達成商品及產品造形之創新。
description.en: Based on the Basic Product Design Course, it aims to integrate Engineering, Marketing and Design in a single product design. You will be given a brief to design a particular product. The design that you develop will be expected to exhibit a good understanding of ergonomic, aesthetic and manufacturing considerations.

description.zh: 介紹傳統以及特殊加工法、製造法、金屬、非金屬材料之製造加工。
description.en: In the design and manufacturing of a product is is essential that the machine as wellas the process be understood, Manufacturing requires tools and machines that can produce products economically as well as accurately. Economy depends to a large extent on the proper selection of a machine or process that will give a satisfactory finished porduct. This course serves as an introduction to various manufacturing, foundry, special casting, and special working process.

description.zh:
從資料收集、分析、評斷、歸納、演繹至構想發展、構想表達、溝通
及具體化與驗實，有系統介紹產品設計之理論及方法、程序及解決不
同階段問題的技術與技巧，以加強設計工作之效率與效益。
description.en:
This course contains a collection of fifteen design methods that student might find useful at various states of a design project. Design methods are tools or techniques for conducting design projects. Student will have to pick and choose amongst them to construct their own design process using their own imagination and preferred ways of working, as well as the methods themselves. No matter of what types 
of project in mind, student should be able to find the methods at least one or two ,at the will help them to get started, to keep going, to change direction or to finish.

description.zh: 延續基本家具與室內設計的基礎教育,以創意的訓練為主.藉由對家具與室內設計空間之相關性的探討,透過實際設計程序的演練,培養解決問題的能力及習得設計的方法.
description.en: Through the operation of small furniture design,sophomirs will practice details of the design process,materials,and manufacturing process.Than by studying natural forms,seniors will use team work of design as the integration of this course in the last semester of thew second year.

description.zh: 照明設計基本原理之介紹為'照明設計'之基礎先修課程.以期學生能獲得照明設計之正確觀點與知識,內容含燈具與光源之關係,光的材料特性與色彩,測光法與光源資料之解釋,以及照明對人生生理與心理上的影響.
description.en: Course Title:Design of Lighting Description:This course is designed for one-semester program in the lighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lightion equipements. lighting design, transmission system, and distribution system) and how to maintain these equipments.

description.zh:
本課程為產品設計專案程序之理論與實務
設計與創造性思考，專案與程序，劇本法邏輯，目標澄清，設計研究與調查，構想展開與評估，細部改善，語意法，專案設計策略。
description.en: This course focuses on concept and methods on product design project. It includes: Design Logic, Scenario Planning, Expression, Legibility, Semantics, Problem Solving, Concept Generation Evolution, Technology and Market.

description.zh: 探討家具製造之最新技術，側重量產設備及其與產品工程的關係。介紹木材加工原理及最新量產設備之性能，以便依據家具特徵如組件形狀，材料性質，及產量多寡等考量，提出有效率的加工計畫（製造流程）。講授家具製造作業程序（從原料接受、備料、細作、裝配以迄塗裝、包裝、發貨等其間之種種細節），特別是以計量的觀點來看家具製造問題，以避免發生瓶頸，製造系統整体概念之培養，尤為重點。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering.This course provides students with an understanding of the principles of wood machining processes and the capabilities of modern production woodworking equipment. Students learn to develop efficient process plans (machining sequences) based on product characteristics such as part geometry, material composition, and production volume.Emphasis is on operations, and the integration of many types of equipment into a manufacturing system. This course specially requires the students to view the manufacturing process in quantitative terms.

description.zh:
以工作站級電腦輔助工業設計軟體 Microstation 之使用為主，教授
學生基本模型之建立方法，並介紹單一模型之材質著色及場景營造方
式，進而教授動畫之製作方式，以此為主題使學生能將模型以更活潑
的動畫方式呈現。
description.en: The study of computer workstation industrial aided design software, Microstation, emphasizing on the models construction, materials editing, scene planning and animation, to present the computer models in the active animation.

description.zh:
講述人的知覺特性、認知行為、決策過程及人體計量等的研究方法和
設計應用，培養學生獨立研究人因設計解決問題的能力。內容偏重於
訊息偵測理論、注意力分配、系統中的控制顯示等。
description.en: Case Study for Ergonomic

description.zh:
解說大型相機多重焦距調整和影像形狀的修正及變形功能,如何配合造
型設計及啟發造形創意,使學生熟悉大型相機操作方式及攝影技巧,由
忠實表現學生自己設計成品的表面材質感.形狀.體積.色彩等等,再深
入到表現.特色.機能.價值感等發揮實用攝影行銷及展示的功效.
description.en: Through the detailed explanations of multiple focusing adjustments and image correcting methods of the view camera(large format camera)to help students master the operation of the camera and many other photo taking techniques.The students shall be able to take picture of their own designing product(showing the right material quality,surface texture,the form,volume,weight and color).Furthermore,the sturents are requested to learn,to make full use of their knowledge as to show the character,function,value and uniqueness of their product in the picture for the purpose marketing promotion and exhibition.

description.zh:
了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基
礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現
技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en:
The course is concerned with the design and production of 
jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is 
delivered through a programme of lectures and practical 
design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques of
production , and its processes and equipments. Based on the 
foundation of design skills, the students can practice the 
techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to 
create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh:
延續設計素描和透視圖學之基礎,加強徒手快速表達能力, 並透過各種
顏料、繪畫素材,訓練各種表現技巧, 以達到能隨心所欲把設計構想、
設計預成圖表現出來,以培養能成為獨立設計師為目的。
